verses.verse: "At that time<WH6256> the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to me, 'Cut<WH6458> out for yourself two<WH8147> tablets<WH3871> of stone<WH68> like the former<WH7223> ones,<WH7223> and come<WH5927> up to Me on the mountain,<WH2022> and make<WH6213> an ark<WH727> of wood<WH6086> for yourself.

'And I will write<WH3789> on the tablets<WH3871> the words<WH1697> that were on the former<WH7223> tablets<WH3871> which<WH834> you shattered,<WH7665> and you shall put<WH7760> them in the ark.<WH727>'

"So I made<WH6213> an ark<WH727> of acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6086> and cut<WH6458> out two<WH8147> tablets<WH3871> of stone<WH68> like the former<WH7223> ones,<WH7223> and went<WH5927> up on the mountain<WH2022> with the two<WH8147> tablets<WH3871> in my hand.<WH3027>

"And He wrote<WH3789> on the tablets,<WH3871> like the former<WH7223> writing,<WH4385> the Ten<WH6235> Commandments<WH1697> which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> had spoken<WH1696> to you on the mountain<WH2022> from the midst<WH8432> of the fire<WH784> on the day<WH3117> of the assembly;<WH6951> and the Lord<WH3068> gave<WH5414> them to me.

"Then I turned<WH6437> and came<WH3381> down<WH3381> from the mountain,<WH2022> and put<WH7760> the tablets<WH3871> in the ark<WH727> which<WH834> I had made;<WH6213> and there<WH8033> they are, as the Lord<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> me."

(Now the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> set<WH5265> out from Beeroth<WH885> Bene-jaakan to Moserah.<WH4149> There<WH8033> Aaron<WH175> died<WH4191> and there<WH8033> he was buried<WH6912> and Eleazar<WH499> his son<WH1121> ministered<WH3547> as priest<WH3547> in his place.<WH8478>
From there<WH8033> they set<WH5265> out to Gudgodah;<WH1412> and from Gudgodah<WH1412> to Jotbathah,<WH3193> a land<WH776> of brooks<WH5158> of water.<WH4325>

At that time<WH6256> the Lord<WH3068> set<WH914> apart<WH914> the tribe<WH7626> of Levi<WH3878> to carry<WH5375> the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of the Lord,<WH3068> to stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> to serve<WH8334> Him and to bless<WH1288> in His name<WH8034> until<WH5704> this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>

Therefore,<WH5921> <WH3651> Levi<WH3878> does not have<WH1961> a portion<WH2506> or inheritance<WH5159> with his brothers;<WH251> the Lord<WH3068> is his inheritance,<WH5159> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> spoke<WH1696> to him.)

"I, moreover, stayed<WH5975> on the mountain<WH2022> forty<WH705> days<WH3117> and forty<WH705> nights<WH3915> like the first<WH7223> time,<WH3117> and the Lord<WH3068> listened<WH8085> to me that time<WH6471> also;<WH1571> the Lord<WH3068> was not willing<WH14> to destroy<WH7843> you.

"Then the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to me, 'Arise,<WH6965> proceed<WH1980> on your journey<WH4550> ahead<WH6440> of the people,<WH5971> that they may go<WH935> in and possess<WH3423> the land<WH776> which<WH834> I swore<WH7650> to their fathers to give<WH1> them.'

"And now,<WH6258> Israel,<WH3478> what<WH4100> does the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> require<WH7592> from you, but to fear<WH3372> the Lord<WH3068> your God,<WH430> to walk<WH1980> in all<WH3605> His ways<WH1870> and love<WH157> Him, and to serve<WH5647> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> with all<WH3605> your heart<WH3824> and with all<WH3605> your soul,<WH5315>
[and] to keep<WH8104> the Lord's commandments<WH4687> and His statutes<WH2708> which<WH834> I am commanding<WH6680> you today<WH3117> for your good<WH9185>?
"Behold,<WH2005> to the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> belong heaven<WH8064> and the highest<WH8064> heavens,<WH8064> the earth<WH776> and all<WH3605> that is in it.

"Yet<WH7534> on your fathers did the Lord<WH1> set<WH3068> His affection<WH2836> to love<WH2836> them, and He chose<WH157> their descendants<WH977> after<WH2233> them, [even] you above<WH310> all<WH4480> peoples,<WH3605> as [it is] this<WH5971> day.<WH2088>
"Circumcise<WH4135> then your heart,<WH3824> and stiffen<WH7185> your neck<WH6203> no<WH3808> more.<WH5750>

"For the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> is the God<WH430> of gods<WH430> and the Lord<WH136> of lords,<WH113> the great,<WH1419> the mighty,<WH1368> and the awesome<WH3372> God<WH410> who<WH834> does not show<WH5375> partiality,<WH5375> <WH6440> nor<WH3808> take<WH3947> a bribe.<WH7810>
"He executes<WH6213> justice<WH4941> for the orphan<WH3490> and the widow,<WH490> and shows<WH157> His love<WH157> for the alien<WH1616> by giving<WH5414> him food<WH3899> and clothing.<WH8071>
"So show<WH157> your love<WH157> for the alien,<WH1616> for you were aliens<WH1616> in the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>
"You shall fear<WH3372> the Lord<WH3068> your God;<WH430> you shall serve<WH5647> Him and cling<WH1692> to Him, and you shall swear<WH7650> by His name.<WH8034>

"He is your praise<WH8416> and He is your God,<WH430> who<WH834> has done<WH6213> these<WH428> great<WH1419> and awesome<WH3372> things<WH3372> for you which<WH834> your eyes<WH5869> have seen.<WH7200>

"Your fathers went<WH1> down<WH3381> to Egypt<WH3381> seventy<WH4714> persons<WH7657> [in all,] and now<WH5315> the Lord<WH6258> your God<WH3068> has made<WH430> you as numerous<WH7760> as the stars<WH7230> of heaven.<WH3556>
